title: Acceleration vectors for cart on a track

content.question: Starting from rest, a cart moves to the right in a straight line along a track. The motion of the cart is represented by the dots shown, recorded at equal time intervals. Which of the following best represents the acceleration vectors at the beginning, middle, and end of the motion?

choices.label: The figure presents 3 vectors in a row. Each of the vectors points to the left and are of a medium size.
The figure presents a vector of medium size that points to the right, followed by a note that indicates that acceleration equals 0, followed by another vector of medium size that points to the left.
The figure presents 3 vectors in a row. Each of the vectors points to the right and are of medium size.
The figure presents 3 vectors in a row that point to the right. The first vector is of a small size, the next vector is a medium size, and the last vector is a small size.
The figure presents 3 vectors in a row that point to the left. The first vector is of a small size, the next vector is a medium size, and the last vector is a small size.

content.answer: The figure presents a vector of medium size that points to the right, followed by a note that indicates that acceleration equals 0, followed by another vector of medium size that points to the left.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
